Package com.g1.mychess.admin.repository

Interface BlacklistRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Blacklist,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Blacklist,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Blacklist,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Blacklist,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Blacklist,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Blacklist>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Blacklist,Long>
@Repository public interface BlacklistRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Blacklist,Long>
Repository interface for interacting with the Blacklist table in the database. Extends JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations and custom query methods.

  • Method Details

    • findByPlayerId

      Optional<Blacklist> findByPlayerId(Long playerId)
      Finds a Blacklist entry by the player ID.
      Parameters:
      playerId - The ID of the player to search for in the blacklist.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the Blacklist entry if found, or empty if not.

    • findAllByIsActiveTrue

      List<Blacklist> findAllByIsActiveTrue()
      Retrieves all active Blacklist entries where the "isActive" field is true.
      Returns:
      A list of Blacklist entries that are currently active.
